      • pseudoIntents

        public static final <G,M> Map<Set<M>,Set<M>> pseudoIntents(MatrixContext<G,M> cxt)
        computes all pseudo-intents of a MatrixContext. This method may be slow, it is only intended for testing purposes. Definition: For a given context (G,M,I) a pseudo-intent is a subset B of the codomain M, such that it is no intent (i.e. B≠B'') and furthermore each strictly smaller pseudo-intent D⊊B has its closure in B (i.e. D''⊆B).
        Parameters:
        cxt - MatrixContext
        Returns:
        a Map whose keys are all pseudo-intents and their intents as values
